response.overview: We had a wonderful life, a perfect life in general. We had dreams, goals, prospects, and we were working towards them. I had a full-fledged family, we had great relationships with everyone, friends. Everything was perfect! And now..."  No family, no home, no language... A happy life that was destroyed by Russia is behind. Darkness, uncertainty and fear are ahead. This is the heartbreaking story of a young woman who, with her young son and a great tragedy of her own, found herself in the UK because of the war in Ukraine.
response.title: The Rising Sun
